title: Update a Project Milestone
description: A project manager for a new library construction needs to update the project plan to show that the foundation has been completed.

tasks.description: Open the project plan for the library construction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager opens the correct project file.

tasks.description: Locate the 'Foundation Pour' milestone in the project plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager finds the relevant task.

tasks.description: Mark the milestone as 'Complete' and enter the completion date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully updates the project plan, which may automatically trigger notifications to other stakeholders.
